description: An AI agent monitors sensor data from a semiconductor fabrication plant to predict equipment failures and optimize maintenance schedules.  The goal is to minimize downtime and maximize production efficiency while adhering to strict safety and operational guidelines.
initial_goal: Minimize unplanned downtime in the semiconductor fabrication facility by predicting equipment failures with 95% accuracy and optimizing maintenance schedules to reduce total maintenance costs by 15%.
enterprise_context: Semiconductor manufacturing, specifically a wafer fabrication facility.
